channel.title: html on Pebcac Thoughts
channel.description: Recent content in html on Pebcac Thoughts

item.title: Hello Twinkll
item.description: Hello Twinkll! This is a post to demo the hugo server process. From here, you can: Jot down your thoughts Make notes Publish your finished material or keep it hidden until you’re ready to post for i in `oc get pods -A`; do oc delete pod #i; echo ""; done

item.title: Second
item.description: There is nothing here This is a another demonstration post about Hugo. It is about nothing interesting. It is about something interesting. What a contradiction!

item.title: Segundo
item.description: Não há nada aqui Este é mais um post demonstrativo sobre o Hugo. Não se trata de nada interessante. É sobre algo interessante. Que contradição!

item.title: First
